channel.title: Test Interfaces + Sendframe126s

item.title: Test Interfaces + Sendframe126s
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Yeah, it annoys me when I have to restart server to see if I put the sendframe126 in correct position (I have to add more or less spaces to center it! Grr!)

So I made this command, use it for whatever purpose

[code] if (command.startsWith(“test”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try {
String text = command.substring(17);
int id = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5, 10));
int frameID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(11, 16));

				if (frameID >= 0 && id >= 0) {
				showInterface(id);
				sendFrame126(text, frameID);

				println_debug("Interface: " + id + " Text: " + text + " SendFrame126 ID: " + frameID);
				} else {
					sendMessage("Error writing interface and text.");
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Invalid Syntax! Use as ::test interface(5) sendframe126(5) text");
		}
}[/code]

Note: If you already have a command called ‘test’ I suggest you rename it.

How you use command:

::test ##### ##### TEXT

First 5 #'s are interface id.
second 5 #'s are sendframe126 id.
TEXT is… text.

See:

I developed this code and I’m showing it off ;D

Read full topic
